The world is watching to see what manner of spirit is revealed by the men and women who claim to believe such strange doctrines. This message of truth must be so proclaimed by human lips, so represented by human character, that many by seeing our good works will glorify our Father in heaven. Your harsh speeches will not convince any soul. Christ has called us to sound the 


                                    -103- 

invitation, "Whosoever will, let him come." It depends very much upon how you give the invitation whether you are successful.
